text: "The images you make give rise to but conflicting goals." #ACIM #quotes
"You can wish for the impossible, but you can will only with God." #ACIM #quotes
"Without the idea of death there is no world." #ACIM #quotes
"You do not know the meaning of anything you perceive." #ACIM #quotes
"All confusion comes from not extending life." #ACIM #quotes
"There is no death, but there is a belief in death." #ACIM #quotes
"Seek not to change the world, but to change your mind about the world." #ACIM #quotes
"When you have been caught in the world of perception you are caught in a dream." #ACIM #quotes
"God's will for me is perfect happiness." #ACIM #quotes
"The retreat to death is not the end of conflict. Only God's Answer is its end." #ACIM #quotes
"This is one of the errors which the ego fosters; that it is capable of true change." #ACIM #quotes
"All that I do I do unto myself." #ACIM #quotes
"If you cannot hear the Voice for God, it is because you do not choose to listen." #ACIM #quotes
"Learning itself, like the classrooms in which it occurs, is temporary." #ACIM #quotes
"Forgiveness is a selective remembering, based not on your selection." #ACIM #quotes
"The course can be summed up very simply in this way: Nothing real can be threatened. Nothing unreal exists." #ACIM #quotes
"Recognize what does not matter." #ACIM #quotes
"Nothing you have ever learned can help you understand the present." #ACIM #quotes
"By not offering total love you will not be healed completely." #ACIM #quotes
"To mean you want the peace of God is to renounce all dreams." #ACIM #quotes
"The closed mind believes the future and the present will be the same." #ACIM #quotes
"Your individual death seems more valuable than your living oneness." #ACIM #quotes
"You are not the victim of the world you see because you invented it." #ACIM #quotes
"You will never be able to exclude yourself from your thoughts." #ACIM #quotes
"What you have not heard is the only Answer." #ACIM #quotes
"It is impossible that you be hurt except by your own thoughts." #ACIM #quotes
"Physical birth is not a beginning; it is a continuing." #ACIM #quotes
"Dreams are chaotic because they are governed by your conflicting wishes." #ACIM #quotes
"The ego is a contradiction." #ACIM #quotes
"Only illusions need defense because of weakness." #ACIM #quotes
"The body is outside you." #ACIM #quotes
"To spirit getting is meaningless and giving is all." #ACIM #quotes
"Illusions are always illusions of differences." #ACIM #quotes
"Any way you handle error results in nothing." #ACIM #quotes
"The world you see is what you gave it, nothing more than that." #ACIM #quotes
"It is not will for life but wish for death that is the motivation for this world." #ACIM #quotes
"Only the mind is capable of error." #ACIM #quotes
"Everything in this world is little because it is a world made out of littleness. #ACIM #quotes
"What seems to die has but been misperceived and carried to illusion." #ACIM #quotes
"A Son of God is happy only when he knows he is with God." #ACIM #quotes
"Your function...is only to decide against deciding what you want." #ACIM #quotes
"You can not escape from what you are." #ACIM #quotes
"There is no place for sacrifice in what has any value." #ACIM #quotes
"Everything outside the Kingdom is illusion." #ACIM #quotes
"Anger is never justified." #ACIM #quotes
"Only the special could have enemies." #ACIM #quotes
"Heaven itself is reached with empty hands and open minds." #ACIM #quotes
"Consciousness is correctly identified as the domain of the ego." #ACIM #quotes
"Oneness cannot be divided." #ACIM #quotes
"There is nothing outside you." #ACIM #quotes
"There is no need to learn through pain." #ACIM #quotes
"A mind and body cannot both exist." #ACIM #quotes
"You learn first that having rests on giving, and not on getting." #ACIM #quotes
"Physical illness represents a belief in magic." #ACIM #quotes
"God is ready now, but you are not." #ACIM #quotes
"When you have accepted your mission to extend peace ~ you will find peace." #ACIM #quotes
"If you are to retain guilt, as the ego insists, you cannot be you." #ACIM #quotes
"Reality opposes nothing." #ACIM #quotes
"Not one thought you hold is wholly true." #ACIM #quotes
"The Atonement is a total commitment." #ACIM #quotes
"You are not sick and you cannot die." #ACIM #quotes
"Without illusions conflict is impossible." #ACIM #quotes
"You...must first recognize that you are miserable and not happy." #ACIM #quotes
"What we think we understand is but confusion born of error." #ACIM #quotes
"The 'reality' of death is firmly rooted in the belief that God's Son is a body." #ACIM #quotes
"Salvation is for the mind, and it is attained through peace." #ACIM #quotes
"This course is easy just because it makes no compromise." #ACIM #quotes
"Illusions are investments. They will last as long as you value them." #ACIM #quotes
"Never can there be peace among the different." #ACIM #quotes
"Time is not involved and every problem can be answered now." #ACIM #quotes
"Doubt is the result of conflicting wishes." #ACIM #quotes
"The truth makes no decisions, for there is nothing to decide between." #ACIM #quotes
"Forget not the Kingdom of God for anything the world has to offer." #ACIM #quotes
"Spirit has no levels, and all conflict arises from the concept of levels." #ACIM #quotes
"[Love] has no secrets; nothing that it would keep apart and hide." #ACIM #quotes
"All healing is essentially the release from fear." #ACIM #quotes
"Unless you hurt yourself you could never suffer in any way." #ACIM #quotes
"It is blasphemous to perceive suffering anywhere." #ACIM #quotes
"Love was never in the world of dreams." #ACIM #quotes
"The strong do not attack because they see no need to do so." #ACIM #quotes
"You have exerted great effort to preserve what you made because it was not true." #ACIM #quotes
"The first step...is the undoing of the getting concept." #ACIM #quotes
"The fear of God is but the fear of loss of idols." #ACIM #quotes
"All the 'pleasures' of the world are nothing." #ACIM #quotes
"Body appetites are not physical in origin." #ACIM #quotes
"You are immortal because you are eternal, and 'always' must be now." #ACIM #quotes
"The thoughts you think are in your mind, as you are in the mind which thought of you." #ACIM #quotes
"You are too confused to recognize your own hope." #ACIM #quotes
"Knowledge never involves comparisons." #ACIM #quotes
"It is but your thoughts that bring you fear." #ACIM #quotes
"To believe in truth you do not have to do anything." #ACIM #quotes
"The past that you remember never was." #ACIM #quotes
"Confusion is not limited. If it occurs at all it will be total." #ACIM #quotes
"The ego is nothing more than a part of your belief about yourself." #ACIM #quotes
"You who want peace can find it only by complete forgiveness." #ACIM #quotes
"Be willing to give up the goals you have established for everything." #ACIM #quotes
"Every problem is an error." #ACIM #quotes
"The body is not cured. It is merely recognized as what it is." #ACIM #quotes
"Knowledge is always stable, and it is quite evident that you are not." #ACIM #quotes
"It is necessary to seek for what is false." #ACIM #quotes
"To believe a Son of God is sick is to worship the same idol he does." #ACIM #quotes
"The essential thing is learning that you do not know." #ACIM #quotes
"All attitudes are ego-based." #ACIM #quotes
"To know your brother is to know God." #ACIM #quotes
"Understand totally by understanding totality." #ACIM #quotes
"The truly given gift entails no loss." #ACIM #quotes
"Love is one. It has no separate parts and no degrees." #ACIM #quotes
"All things work together for good." #ACIM #quotes
"The present is before time was." #ACIM #quotes
"Inventiveness is wasted effort even in its most ingenious form." #ACIM #quotes
"Forget this world, forget this course." #ACIM #quotes
"You are not special." #ACIM #quotes
"Specialness is the great dictator of the wrong decisions." #ACIM #quotes
"The Son of God is you." #ACIM #quotes
"What the body's eyes behold is only conflict." #ACIM #quotes
"You attack the real world every day and every hour and every minute." #ACIM #quotes
"Money is not evil. It is nothing." #ACIM #quotes
"The stars will disappear, and night and day will be no more." #ACIM #quotes
"Do you prefer that you be right or happy?" #ACIM #quotes
"Illusion recognized must disappear." #ACIM #quotes
"You cannot perpetuate an illusion about another without perpetuating it about yourself." #ACIM #quotes
"This world was over long ago." #ACIM #quotes
"Salvation is our only need. There is no other purpose here." #ACIM #quotes
"When you react at all to errors, you are not listening to the Holy Spirit." #ACIM #quotes
"You are the dreamer of the world of dreams." #ACIM #quotes
"The only way out of the error is to decide that you do not have to decide anything." #ACIM #quotes
"No one who lives in fear is really alive." #ACIM #quotes
"You do not know the peace of power that opposes nothing." #ACIM #quotes
"Reality cannot be partly appreciated." #ACIM #quotes
"If you want peace, you must give up the idea of conflict entirely." #ACIM #quotes
"God and His creations are beyond belief because they are beyond question." #ACIM #quotes
"Your definition of Heaven is hell and oblivion." #ACIM #quotes
"Perfection is not a matter of degree." #ACIM #quotes
"Why should the body be anything to you?" #ACIM #quotes
"One illusion cherished...makes all truth meaningless." #ACIM #quotes
"There is no partial healing." #ACIM #quotes
"There are no idle thoughts." #ACIM #quotes
"'Laws of chaos' is a meaningless term." #ACIM #quotes
"Health is the result of relinquishing all attempts to use the body lovelessly." #ACIM #quotes
"Only unwillingness to learn it could make such an easy lesson difficult." #ACIM #quotes
"The opposite of love is fear." #ACIM #quotes
"And if fear is real, then you do not exist at all." #ACIM #quotes
"'Giving to get' is an inescapable law of the ego." #ACIM #quotes
"Health is inner peace." #ACIM #quotes
"There are no satisfactions in the world." #ACIM #quotes
"There is a place in you where there is perfect peace." #ACIM #quotes
"Analyzing the motives of others is hazardous to you." #ACIM #quotes
"There is nothing to be feared." #ACIM #quotes
"You have one test...If you are wholly free of fear of any kind." #ACIM #quotes
"If you attack error in another, you will hurt yourself." #ACIM #quotes
"God is not the author of fear. You are." #ACIM #quotes
"The illusion of peace is not the condition in which truth can enter." #ACIM #quotes
"This world is a picture of the crucifixion of God's Son." #ACIM #quotes
"You are afraid of God because you fear your brother." #ACIM #quotes
"If God is real, there is no pain. If pain is real, there is no God." #ACIM #quotes
"You cannot be totally committed sometimes." #ACIM #quotes
"Thoughts of attack and of being attacked are not different." #ACIM #quotes
"The world you see is the delusional system of those made mad by guilt." #ACIM #quotes
"The changes the ego seeks to make are not really changes." #ACIM #quotes
"Instead of judging, we need but be still and let all things be healed." #ACIM #quotes
"For fear lies not in reality, but in the minds of children who do not understand reality." #ACIM #quotes
"The ego wants to have things for salvation, for possession is its law." #ACIM #quotes
"All that you are asked to do is to make room for truth." #ACIM #quotes
"Be not afraid to circumvent the voices of the world." #ACIM #quotes
"To see a sinless body is impossible." #ACIM #quotes
"It is you who have the power to dominate all things you see." #ACIM #quotes
"The ego is incapable of knowing how you feel." #ACIM #quotes
"You must learn the cost of sleeping, and refuse to pay it." #ACIM #quotes
"The world you see does not exist." #ACIM #quotes
"Knowing, as we have already observed, does not lead to doing." #ACIM #quotes
"Every decision you make stems from what you think you are." #ACIM #quotes
"The present is forgiveness." #ACIM #quotes
"Ultimately no compromise is possible between everything and nothing." #ACIM #quotes
"Love is freedom." #ACIM #quotes
"The thing you dread the most is your salvation." #ACIM #quotes
"All illness is mental illness." #ACIM #quotes
"What you think you are is a belief to be undone." #ACIM #quotes
"You cannot really not let go what has already gone." #ACIM #quotes
"Mistake not truce for peace." #ACIM #quotes
"Sin is the belief that your perception is unchangeable." #ACIM #quotes
"Do not see error. Do not make it real." #ACIM #quotes
"You have every reason to feel afraid as you perceive yourself." #ACIM #quotes
"Salvation is always ready and always there." #ACIM #quotes
"Your inheritance awaits only the recognition that you have been redeemed." #ACIM #quotes
"When you want only love you will see nothing else." #ACIM #quotes
"No gift of Heaven has been more misunderstood than has forgiveness." #ACIM #quotes
"Reality can dawn only on an unclouded mind." #ACIM #quotes
"On confusion has this world been based, and there is nothing else it rests upon." #ACIM #quotes
"Perception...is impossible without a belief in 'more' and 'less.'" #ACIM #quotes
"Only what you have not given can be lacking in any situation." #ACIM #quotes
"Conflict is the root of all evil." #ACIM #quotes
"Who can dream of hatred and not fear God?" #ACIM #quotes
"Conflict is sleep, and peace awakening. Death is illusion; life, eternal truth." #ACIM #quotes
"Who would attempt to fly with the tiny wings of a sparrow when the mighty power of the eagle has been given him?" #ACIM #quotes
"When teaching is no longer necessary you will merely know God." #ACIM #quotes
"You are not weak, as is the image of yourself." #ACIM #quotes
"Depression is isolation, and so it could not have been created." #ACIM #quotes
"What guilt has wrought is ugly, fearful and very dangerous." #ACIM #quotes
"Every mistake must be a call for love." #ACIM #quotes
"Ultimately space is as meaningless as time. Both are merely beliefs." #ACIM #quotes
